BaseComponent
description: This is the BaseComponent class which all elements within the FormioForm derive from.

name: constructor
description: Initialize a new BaseComponent.

params.name: component
params.description: The component JSON you wish to initialize.

params.name: options
params.description: The options for this component.

params.name: data
params.description: The global data submission object this component will belong.

name: id
description:
The ID of this component. This value is auto-generated when the component is created, but
can also be provided from the component.id value passed into the constructor.

name: options
description: The options for this component.

name: _hasCondition
description: Determines if this component has a condition assigned to it.

name: events
description: The events that are triggered for the whole FormioForm object.

name: data
description: The data object in which this component resides.

name: component
description: The Form.io component JSON schema.

name: element
description: The bounding HTML Element which this component is rendered.

name: tbody
description: The HTML Element for the table body. This is relevant for the "multiple" flag on inputs.

name: labelElement
description: The HTMLElement that is assigned to the label of this component.

name: errorElement
description: The HTMLElement for which the errors are rendered for this component (usually underneath the component).

name: error
description: The existing error that this component has.

name: inputs
description: An array of all of the input HTML Elements that have been added to this component.

name: info
description: The basic component information which tells the BaseComponent how to render the input element of the components that derive from this class.

name: row
description: The row path of this component.

name: _disabled
description: Determines if this component is disabled, or not.

name: _visible
description: Determines if this component is visible, or not.

name: pristine
description: If this input has been input and provided value.

name: parent
description: Points to the parent component.

name: root
description: Points to the root component, usually the FormComponent.

name: inputMask
description: The Input mask instance for this component.

name: validators
description: The validators that are assigned to this component.

name: triggerChange
description: Used to trigger a new change in this component.

name: eventHandlers
description: An array of event handlers so that the destry command can deregister them.

name: eventListeners
description: An array of the event listeners so that the destroy command can deregister them.

description: Get the embed source of the form.

{
  "name": "formiojs",
  "version": "2.29.0",
  "description": "Common js library for client side interaction with <form.io>",
  "main": "build/formio.js",
  "files": [
    "dist",
    "build",
    "utils.js",
    "wizard.js",
    "form.js",
    "embed.js",
    "full.js"
  ],
  "scripts": {
    "prepublish": "gulp build",
    "build": "esdoc;gulp build",
    "serve": "jekyll serve --config _config.yml,_config.dev.yml",
    "test": "./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --verbose --single-run",
    "test:watch": "./node_modules/karma/bin/karma start --no-single-run --auto-watch"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/formio/formio.js.git"
  },
  "contributors": [
    {
      "name": "Travis Tidwell",
      "github": "https://github.com/travist",
      "email": "travis@form.io"
    },
    {
      "name": "Randall Knutson",
      "github": "https://github.com/randallknutson",
      "email": "randall@form.io"
    },
    {
      "name": "Doug Lee",
      "github": "https://github.com/douglaselee",
      "email": "douglaselee@comcast.net"
    },
    {
      "name": "Eric Alter",
      "email": "neolanders@hotmail.com"
    },
    {
      "name": "Guillaume SMAHA",
      "email": "guillaume.smaha@gmail.com"
    }
  ],
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/formio/formio.js/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/formio/formio.js#readme",
  "dependencies": {
    "browser-cookies": "^1.2.0",
    "choices.js": "^3.0.3",
    "dialog-polyfill": "^0.4.9",
    "eventemitter2": "^5.0.1",
    "flatpickr": "^4.2.4",
    "i18next": "^10.3.0",
    "json-logic-js": "^1.2.2",
    "lodash": "^4.17.4",
    "moment": "^2.20.1",
    "native-promise-only": "^0.8.1",
    "shallow-copy": "0.0.1",
    "signature_pad": "^2.3.0",
    "text-mask-addons": "^3.7.1",
    "tooltip.js": "^1.1.7",
    "vanilla-text-mask": "^5.0.1",
    "whatwg-fetch": "^2.0.3"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-plugin-array-includes": "^2.0.3",
    "babel-plugin-espower": "^2.4.0",
